description: Explore the intricate regulatory challenges facing Arbitrum, a layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum, amidst the evolving landscape of Decentralized Finance (DeFi). Learn about Arbitrum's technical advantages, regulatory uncertainties, and potential solutions for navigating this complex environment.
keywords: Arbitrum, regulatory challenges, decentralized finance, DeFi, Ethereum scaling, optimistic rollups, blockchain technology, financial regulation, SEC, cross-jurisdictional issues, consumer protection, AML, KYC, compliance, smart contracts, industry standards
title: Arbitrum and Regulatory Challenges: Navigating the Evolving Landscape of Decentralized Finance
